Package fr.cnrs.iees.omugi.graph.io

Interface GraphImporter

All Known Implementing Classes:
OmugiGraphImporter
public interface GraphImporter

Interface for graph importation from external sources. A GraphImporter returns a Graph read from any kind of source (stream, file, String...). This interface also provides static utility methods for importing graphs.

Implementations of this class should use implementations of Parser and Tokenizer to process their input.

Author:
Shayne - long ago.
Heavily refactored by J.Gignoux nov. 2017

    • preprocess

      static List<String> preprocess​(List<String> lines)

      Returns:
